title: Choose from multiple question types
desciption: From Drag and Drop to Fill in the blanks, and from MCQs to Video response, mix and match eleven different question types to create effective live quizzes.

title: Tap into detailed reports
desciption: Get insightful and lightning-quick reports on individual student responses and overall class performance. Print, download, or share these reports with just one click.

title: Integrate with an LMS
desciption: Update quizzes, lessons, and grades in the blink of an eye by syncing Quizizz with an LMS like Canvas, Schoology, or Google Classroom.
